sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is one of many conservatives upset about the Department of Homeland Security's new Disinformation Governance Board, calling it a "bureau of disinformation" and a "belated April Fool's joke."
author: Hannah Getahun
title: DeSantis calls DHS Disinformation Governance Board a 'belated April Fool's joke'

sentence: Last year, current GOP darling Ron DeSantis loosely referred to efforts to address global warming as left-wing stuff.? These arent examples from decades ago.
author: LZ Granderson
title: Column: Republican denial will add to the droughts body count

sentence: By his side in the bar was Floridas governor, Ron DeSantis, a likely candidate for the partys 2024 presidential nomination who was fresh off his legislation punishing Disney for opposing his new law baring instruction on sexual orientation and gender identity in kindergarten through the third grade.
author: KEN RITTER and NICHOLAS RICCARDI
title: GOP pins hopes on Nevada's Laxalt to help win Senate control
